snippet: Middlesex County authorities face a daunting question under escalating scrutiny: whether to charge some or all of the boys in the hazing case as adults.
abstract: Seven Sayreville, NJ, high school football players accused of violent sexual hazing could be charged as adults.
lead_paragraph: Middlesex County authorities face a daunting question under escalating scrutiny: whether to charge some or all of the boys in the hazing case as adults.

headline.main: Seven Charged in Sayreville Hazing Case Could Be Tried as Adults
headline.print_headline: 7 Charged in Hazings Could Face Adult Court
